description: This table extracts the related multiple response item PED-442.

columns.name: PED_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the education record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: REVIEWED_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the instant (UTC) this education point was last reviewed by the corresponding user. Every time a user opens an education point, this item gets updated
